title: There Are Too Many Truck Reincarnations! 〜The Truck Drivers Are Crying〜 - Novel Updates
tags: Chuunibyou   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Suicides
author: Yukishiba Tetsu
description:
Buntarou Sugawara, a truck driver from Hokkaido, was tasked with the job of carrying wood to Kumamoto by his boss.

However, this was also a battle with the reincarnation applicants who dreamed of getting transported to another world.

They threw themselves onto the truck’s path; if he ran them over, Buntarou would lose his license and job, and it would mean the end of his life too.

Still, Buntarou will drive his truck.

To protect his livelihood, to protect the company he works for, with his heart and soul, he will drive the truck to Kumamoto!>
